Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters relating to knockback.

damage_No.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the none damage animation is applied.

damage_Min.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the minimal damage animation is applied.

damage_S.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the small damage animation is applied.

damage_M.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the medium damage animation is applied.

damage_L.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the large damage animation is applied.

damage_Blow.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the blow-off damage animation is applied.

guard_Min.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the none damage animation is applied when guarding.

guard_S.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the small damage animation is applied when guarding.

guard_M.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the medium damage animation is applied when guarding.

guard_L.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the large damage animation is applied when guarding.

trunk_Brake.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the AC trunk is broken.

guard_Brake.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when the AC trunk is broken when guarding.

dl1_Rate.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when at damage level 1.

dl2_Rate.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when at damage level 2.

dl1_Blade_Rate.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when at damage level 1, when using a melee blade.

dl2_Blade_Rate.Wiki: The knockback multiplier to apply when at damage level 2, when using a melee blade.
